name: Dream Reavers #4
description:
The exciting conclusion to the epic series comes to a close.   It's a battle that can't be missed.  The revelations don't stop and the fate of the world hangs in the balance.  

Issue is signed by creator, Raphael Moran in silver ink.  Comes in plastic case with white cardboard backing.   SPECIAL anniversary SALE.   1 dollar off the original cover price.   Limited time offer.

name: Dream Reavers #3
description:
The third chapter of the saga, happens to be the most revealing.  Learn the shocking truth behind the origins of the Dream Reavers and the evil Spook King.    

Issue is signed by creator, Raphael Moran and comes in plastic case with white cardboard backing.   Limited supplies.   Special anniversary SALE!!!  We've taken a dollar off the cover price.

name: Dream Reavers #2
description:
Get the second chapter in the epic mini-series by Raphael Moran.   In this issue our heroes are finally brought together to battle the evil Spooks and a shocking secret is finally revealed.  Plus we get the first full introduction to the Spook King.    

This issue comes signed by creator, Raphael Moran in silver ink.   Issue comes in plastic case and white cardboard backing.

name: Dream Reavers #1
description:
The first exciting issue that critics are raving about.  This issue will be signed by the creator, Raphael Moran in silver ink.  Issue comes with plastic case and white cardboard backing.  Supplies are limited.   

Summary- Teens from around the world are suddenly going into a coma at the exact same time.   One by one they are pulled out of their dreams into a strange new world called Astral.  This is a place where nightmare creatures called Spooks feed off of the dark dreams and fears of humankind.   The only beacon of hope lies at a giant spire of light.   The heroes journey begins...
